meanings: an obvious[a clear, a distinct] difference
clearly, plainly, definitely, evidently, obviously, certainly

vlive.korean: 날 싫어하는 게 분명해! I'm sure that he hates me! 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: I'm sure that he hates me!

vlive.korean: 베리야 넌 내가 좋은 게 분명해 그렇지? Berry! I'm sure that you like me, right? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: Berry! I'm sure that you like me, right?

vlive.korean: 미적 감각이 있는 게 분명해 - 어때요? He certainly is good at art. - How is it? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 미리 크리스마스 모아
vlive.english: He certainly is good at art. - How is it?

vlive.korean: 이건 가발이야 분명해! 아니야 검정색 머리인 거야! "This is definitely a wig!" "No! It's black hair!" 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 🐻: 릴레이 브이앱하러 도망갈까...?🏃
vlive.english: "This is definitely a wig!" "No! It's black hair!"

vlive.korean: [역시 범규 형은 오락에 재능이 있는 게 분명해요] 여러분 박수! [BEOMGYU must be talented in video games] Clap for me, everyone! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TALK X TODAY EP.4
vlive.english: [BEOMGYU must be talented in video games] Clap for me, everyone!
